DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the certification status of the laboratory performing the tests.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A laboratory providing analyses of samples collected in clinical care or research._The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body. Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose.[manually curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A laboratory providing analyses of samples collected in clinical care or research.

Concepts.definition: A laboratory providing analyses of samples collected in clinical care or research.

Property.preferredDefinition: A designation earned by a person that indicates that the person has specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of the certifying body.  Similarly, a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose.

Concepts.definition: The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body.  Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A laboratory providing analyses of samples collected in clinical care or research._The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body. Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose._A condition or state at a particular time.[manually curated]

PermissibleValues.value: Tests not entirely performed by a CMS certified laboratory
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Tests not entirely performed by a CMS certified laboratory

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Tests not entirely performed by a CMS certified laboratory
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Tests not entirely performed by a Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) certified laboratory

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Test entirely performed by a CMS certified laboratory

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Test entirely performed by a CMS certified laboratory
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: All tests performed by a laboratory certified by Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) using appropriate FDA-approved test kits for donor screening and confirmatory testing

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
